vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to increase the service contract with Stearns, Conrad and Schmidt, Consulting Engineers, Inc. dba SCS Engineers, SCS Field Services for an expansion of scope in the operational management of the McCommas Bluff Landfill - Not to exceed $852,500.00, from $3,410,000.00 to $4,262,500.00 - Financing: Sanitation Operation Fund
